name: Monkey Meltdown
description:
Monkey Meltdown Playable on PC, MAC and most Mobile Devices

Your colony depends on you for food, you need to bring back the banana stash being guarded by the non-friendlies. BEWARE... The leader of the non-friendlies is on the edge of a meltdown.

Fight your way through a procedurally generated jungle. Fling poo and swing your hammer to defend yourself from the enemies.

Tips:

  • Mangos restore health
  • Dragon fruit restores poo
  • Swinging your hammer does a ton of damage

Desktop Controls

  • Move with WASD and Arrow keys
  • Aim with the mouse, click to fling
  • Press X to swap weapons

Mobile Controls

  • Move with the left stick
  • Aim and Shoot with the right stick
  • Weapon swap is on the top right of the screen

Made with love for the VimJam2  2021.  Theme having a boss and on the edge.

This game was built using a custom Javascript/Typescript engine that I created. If you are interested in it reach out to me and I can link you to the repo.
